easy.title: The Greeting Scroll
easy.description: Your first quest awaits! Today's challenge is simple but meaningful.
easy.task: Say 'Good morning' or 'Hello' to someone today. It could be a neighbor, store clerk, or anyone you meet.
tips: Don't worry if they don't respond - you did great!

easy.title: The Smile Mission
easy.description: A smile can brighten someone's day, including yours!
easy.task: Smile at 3 different people today. Count each genuine smile you share.

easy.title: Eye Contact Training
easy.description: Eye contact shows confidence and connection.
easy.task: Make 3 seconds of eye contact during any conversation today.
tips: Look at the bridge of their nose if direct eye contact is hard
Count slowly to 3 in your head
It's okay to look away after - you did it!

easy.title: Thank You Quest
easy.task: Thank a service worker today - cashier, barista, bus driver, anyone helping you.
tips: Be specific: 'Thank you for your help'
Notice how it makes them smile

easy.title: The Wave Hello
easy.description: Sometimes a gesture speaks louder than words.
easy.task: Wave hello to a neighbor or someone you recognize from a distance.
tips: A small wave is perfectly fine
Add a smile if you feel comfortable
It counts even if they don't wave back

medium.title: Small Talk Initiation
medium.description: Break the ice with casual conversation.
medium.task: Start a conversation about the weather or current surroundings with someone.

medium.title: The Compliment Giver
medium.task: Give someone a genuine, specific compliment today.
tips: Focus on choices: 'I like your shoes/bag'
Or actions: 'You did great in that presentation'

medium.title: Question Master
medium.description: Show interest in others through questions.
medium.task: Ask someone about their weekend, day, or a hobby.

hard.title: Opinion Warrior
hard.task: Share your opinion in a group discussion or meeting today.
tips: Start with 'I think...' or 'In my opinion...'

hard.title: Invitation Sender
hard.description: Take the initiative in building connections.
hard.task: Invite someone to grab coffee, lunch, or do an activity together.
tips: Keep it casual: 'Want to grab coffee sometime?'
It's okay if they say no - you were brave!
